abstract: Corporate raider Carl Icahn fired off an angry letter to the board of Forest Laboratories Friday, demanding that it come clean on its succession plans.
snippet: Corporate raider Carl Icahn fired off an angry letter to the board of Forest Laboratories Friday, demanding that it come clean on its succession plans.
lead_paragraph: Carl Icahn, the corporate raider, fired off an angry letter to the board of Forest Laboratories Friday, demanding that it come clean on its succession plans.

headline.main: Icahn Takes Aim at Forest Lab’s Succession Plan
